title: Teaching
text:
I coordinate and lecture across the following modules. Below, you can access up to date teaching materials for each.





Research Ethics
RES09073 | Technological University of the Shannon: Midlands Midwest
Critically reflect on research practices, from questionable research practices and open science, to informed consent and ethical philosophies.
 View Materials








Academic Writing
RES09074 | Technological University of the Shannon: Midlands Midwest
Explore the academic publishing landscape from structuring empirical manuscripts and research theses, through critiquing the peer review process and developing research impact statements.
 View Materials








Research Methodology
RES09075 | Technological University of the Shannon: Midlands Midwest
Develop a broad understanding of research methodology, considering research paradigms, methodological alignment, theories on the nature of knowledge, research credibility, and common quantitative, qualitative, and mixed methods designs.
 View Materials
